docs.snippet: The main players in the Penn State child-sex abuse scandal involving former assistant football coach Jerry Sandusky. After two days of testimony, a judge determined Tuesday there was enough evidence for the case against three former top administra...

docs.snippet: African Champions League holders Al Ahli have been denied permission to postpone a key group match despite not having a venue for Sunday's clash, the club and confederation of African football (CAF) said on Tuesday....
